Title: Lesbian Request Denied
Plot: Targeted for romance by a fellow prisoner, Piper finds that subtlety is an ineffective approach to letting her suitor down.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks, Laverne Cox, Maria Dizzia, Joel Marsh Garland, Natasha Lyonne, Arden Myrin, Michael Rainey, Jr., Deborah Rush, Morgan Spector, Tanya Wright
